articles.title: Trump dismantles Voice of America with executive order - BBC.com
articles.description: More than 1,300 staff placed on administrative leave as White House accuses VOA of being anti-Trump, "radical" and "leftist".
articles.content:
Thomas Mackintosh & Merlyn Thomas
US President Donald Trump has signed an order to strip back federally funded news organisation Voice of America, accusing it of being "anti-Trump" and "radical"… [+3603 chars]
